manawa shasthra pasala
ane numbaa langa sitiyanam …
chuti ma kale bonikkoth ekka sellam karanawa, kawanawa, powanawa, nawanawa.
otunu nopalan hela sakwithi rajekuge awasan gamana ese wiya.
methanadi mama dakapu hodama deya thamayi ape rate pradhana purawasiya wana janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awurudu charithra itukarapu aakaraya prasansaniyayi.
dan parakku wadiyi anith minisunwa harawaganna.
obe rangana diwiye nawathum pala sinamawa wiya haki bawa me katha bahedi kiyawuna.
nipunathwayak nathuwa katayuthu kirima honda natha.
nawina thakshanaya saha wyayam ekata pahi yana wyaparayakata, koyi tharam durak ya haki dayi ohu dana sitiyeya.
inpasu elambaiye thaththage prashna walata pilithuru dime warayayi.
sadanige anagathaya pilibanda dahasakuth suba sihina mage sithe pirennata patan gaththeya..
hitapu saukhya amathi, dan janadhipathi, maitha්ripala sira...

ee pinthura ayithi hamotama bohoma sthuthiyi.
ee sama denage ayithiyak.
ema tharagayedi sha්ri lanka kandayama pitiyata paminima pa්ramada kirima nisa mema danduwama panawa thibe.

menna methathanin balanna.

sadharana samajayak sandaha wu wyaparaye menma piwithuru hetak jathika sabhawe nirmathaෲ warun wu, pujaniya wandaniya maduluwawe sobhitha nayaka swamin wahanseth, mawil aaru sorowwa kriyanwithaye purogamiya wu athuraliya rathana swamin wahanseth, eda medathura sadharanaya ha yukthiya wenuwen peni sita janatha hadawathwala mahath prasadayak himi karagath patali champika ranawaka mathithumath obath samanga biththiyata heththu wi kara kiyagatha deyak nomathiwa sitina bawa me rate janathawata nothereyi kiya oba sithanawa nam, eya hudek wihiluwak pamanayi garu mathithumani.
kandayame palamu prakashaya hotalaya mudra thaba athi bawa prathikshepa kara natha.
mema sarawa piri kurulawa kada mirika nodammoth boho wita ibema pupura iwath wenawa.
getarayan alla ganimata ama lesa kalu jathika wahalunge ladaruwan yoda ganimata amerikan suddan kaෲra wuha.

mema wartha dekama binda damimata thawamath kisima kandayamakata hakiwi nothibima da shri lanka kandayamata gaurawayak.wissayi 20 tharaga ithihasaye hondama pandu yawime warthawa thaba aththe ape ajantha mendis. 2011 agosthu 08 wanida oostreliyawata erehiwa lakunu 16 kata kadulu 6 k laba ganimin ohu ema daskama dakwuwa.siw wani loka kusalana tharagawaliya shri lankawe pawathwena nisath, shri lanka kandayame daskam nisath, mewara shurathawa dina ganime wadi idakadak shri lanka kandayama sathuwa athi bawa boho krida wicharakayin pawasanawa.kese wethath meya liyana mohotha wanawita pawathi loka shrenigatha kirima anuwa idiriyen ma sitinne dakunu aprikawayi.
eeth eya epayi baya wenna.
kalekata passe dakke post ekak!

lowapura wu aarakshawa sabandi parshawakaruwan, widwathun saha aarakshaka wisheshagnyayan rasakage sahabhagithwayen ‘goliya wiyawul hamuwe deshaye surakshawa’ yana themawa osse mewarath ‘kolambaa aarakshaka samuluwa - 2018’ agosthu masa 30 saha 31 dinayanhidi kolambaa bandaranayaka anusmarana jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawe di pawathwimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara atha.

ade me mulu sinduwama rap kaloth kohoma hitiyida?..heh, heh,thada kalu patin thiyenne rap kalla hondada?onna mehemayi sin eka....mama thamayi sinduwa kiyanne...henriya rap kalla kiyanawa bohoma gorosu katahandakin...bisaru liyan mada rusiru supul watha,sasala karayi hada mananiye,madana thedin indu sadisi yowun landa,bandinu thadin hitha dehiniye,bandapiya, bandapiya, thadatama bandapiya,bisaru liyage me supul da puhul da, mokak da manda oona mangulak,watha kiyanne nam munata ne bola,puhulak wageda aa ban ethakota,ara bisaruda kageda munaththahaduwa,rathadara piyumehi ron sunu wagiretha,kelesada hanguman madalanne,uthura yadden ronkanda maduyahane,himakara sewane ekahine,numbaa sathapami nawa amarathi ranalole,appata siri gaja,nandata kaju mada,anna ara koheda,hunuth gawilalu,thawath monawadath,oonalu aayema,madalantath,ithin bole umbaa,apita kiyanne,ahawal ekatada?umbaema hanguman,puluwannan mada,pawaththagan umbaa,kohoma unath nanapita ekayi banheh, heh, dakkada?jaramara asse,karaththa kiwahe,me okkoma asse,ara ammandiwa,nawantath oonalu...ane manda bola,kawada ahapuwada?wipulitha lama rana hansa thudata kima,duhul saluwa hirihara denne,wiyaki yadden ee salupata wage,mage saragi sothapa,numbaa ran banda ma ha sayanetha rayame.....hansa thudata hiriharayilu saluwen,karuna karala me tika ahanawa,hansayinge himikariya eekath,balaganiyi newa oona widihata,thamunta mokatada eeke withthiyak,mage saragi sothapa...numbaa ran banda ma ha sayanetha rayame.....hah, onna panna bola,balala mallen,mekata thamayine,mechchara dangaluwe,mage saragi sothapa...numbaa ran banda ma ha sayanetha rayame.....

bauddha granthawala jiwithaya imak konak nopenena sagarayata upama kota athi bawin mehila dhiwara samajayak padaka karagaththe eki bauddha darshanayata mema natakaya wadath aasanna karanu pinisa bawa gunasena galappaththi prakasha kara atha.natyaye katha nayikawa thama samiyage sohoyura samanga pawathwana lingika asura hethuwen meya asabhya natakayak lesa da athamun handunwannata yedunu aakarayak peni yayi.natyaye mangala darshanayen pasu athameku rangahalen pitawa giye ‘onna sinhala wedikawatath kunuharupa bokarala” yayi pawasamini.

kiyagenama ma ethanin eliyata aawemi...dan nidimatha pahawa gosini.apage bilattuwa asala ambaa gas kihipayak wiya..udasana wasikili yama sandaha mema ambaa gasak yatin pamini ekekuge hisa yamaka wadima nisa ihala balu sebalata peni aththe yamekuge kakul dekayi...biya wu sebala ka gasannata wu pasu siddiya an aya dana gena thibini..apa dedena ena witath ambaa gasa yata sahena pirisak wuha...kohendo ekek gena aa toch ekak gasa uda ellemin thibu sirurata ella karana ladi...ema muhuna aduraganimata pahasu wiya..bella adawi diwa eliyata ademin thibini...eka eka ek ek ayage nam kiyannata wu athara awasanaye tika welawakin pasuwa.."me eesi saman kumara neda..?"

adhyayanaye pahasuwa sandaha manasika roga sayikosiya ha niyurosiya yanuwen pradhana kotas dekakata beda athi athara, ema kotas da charya aabadha, paurusha aabadha, lingika wyabadha, mano kayika aabadha aadi washayen nawatha nawatha kotas kara dakwa atha.

ee anuwa wahama kriyathmaka wu pradhana widhayaka niladhariwaraya me bawa shri lanka krikat paripalanaya bharawa sitina krikat nisi baladhari krida amathyanshaye lekam kamal padmasiri mahathata menma krida amathya fayisar musthapa mahathata danum di athi athara me sambandhawa wahama mulya aparadha wimarshana kottasayata paminillak karana lesa amathya musthapa wisin pradhana widhayaka silwa mahathata niyoga kara atha.

udaharanayak lesa 1998di osama bin ladan sitina sthanaya pilibandawa itha niwaradi oththuwak si.ayi.ee oththusewayata labunada ema thorathura osse bin ladan sangawi sitina sthanayata kaෲs misayila praharayak ellakarannata winadi 80ka kalayak gathawuna.
ese nomathiwa bhasha igenima sidu kirima mishan inposibal ya.
